submission:
from typing import List
import numpy

class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        ans = 0

        diffList = []
        for a, b in zip(nums, target):
            diffList.append(a-b)

        diff = numpy.array(diffList)

        # print(nums)
        # print(target)
        # print(diff)

        i = 0
        while i < len(diff):

            j = 0
            triggered = False
            while i + 1 < len(diff) and diff[i] == 0:
                i += 1
                triggered = True

            if not triggered and i == len(diff) - 1:
                ans += abs(diff[-1])
                break

            j = i
            minVal = diff[i]
            if diff[i] > 0:
                while j < len(diff) - 1 and diff[j+1] > 0:
                    j += 1
                    minVal = min(diff[j], minVal)
            else:
                while j < len(diff) - 1 and diff[j+1] < 0:
                    j += 1
                    minVal = max(diff[j], minVal)

            diff[i:j+1] -= minVal
            ans += abs(minVal)
            # print(diff)

        return ans
